Years later, that same voice has become her strength. The actor has now collaborated with Meta as the new voice of its AI assistant across multiple countries, marking a major milestone in her journey of self-acceptance.

And my accent, but I continue to own it. I think thatâ€™s probably how and why it happened.â€ Her words highlight how traits that were once seen as flaws can, over time, become defining strengths when embraced with confidence.
